lcd: 1x LCD interface, supporting STN or TFT LCD and resolution up to 1024 x 768
memory: 1Mbyte Nor Flash (support 2Mbyte for option), 64Mbyte Nand Flash, 64Mbyte SDRAM
label12: 3 serial ports available through 14-pin (2.0mm space) interface
label13: 2 serial ports available through ST16C2550 chip extension
